JOB DESCRIPTION: Qualifications    Essential criteria  :    Either Java or C# (doesn't need to know both but must be comfortable in quickly picking up skills and learning a new language)     Cloud experience preferrable     Agile experience     DevOps knowledge     At least 5 years SDLC experience     Preferably has knowledge of following architectures: Serverless, Microservices, Containers     Full stack a bonus     Preferred criteria  :    Customer-facing experience in a professional environment     Cloud application or Cloud solutions development experience     Experience of working in a Scrum Team and an Agile environment     Experience in UI
